author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Standard Diversified Q1 Sales Rose 11.3 Percent To $74.3 Mln
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Standard Diversified Inc:
* . REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR ITS FIRST QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31, 2018
* Q1 SALES ROSE 11.3 PERCENT TO $74.3 MILLION * QTRLY NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO SDI PER CLASS A AND CLASS B COMMON SHARE $0.03 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
